import React, { useState } from "react"; import { services } from "../../service-card-component/services"; import { HiDocumentAdd } from "react-icons/hi"; import { MdDeleteForever } from "react-icons/md"; import "./invoice.styles.css"; const newInvoice = { invoiceNumber: 1, id: Math.round(Math.random() * 89), customer: { name: "", billingAddress: "", shippingAddress: "", email: "", phoneNumber: "", }, items: [], }; export const InvoiceNew = () => { const [invoice, setInvoice] = useState([]); const [itemList, setItemList] = useState([]); console.log(itemList); const addItem = () => { const qty = +document.getElementById("qty-inp").value; const descript = document.getElementById("des-inp").value; const cost = +document.getElementById("cost-inp").value; const serviceOpt = document.getElementById("serv").value; setItemList([ ...itemList, { id: itemList.length, serviceType: serviceOpt, quntity: qty, price: cost, description: descript, }, ]); }; return (
